Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: canvas
Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.abstract: The layout best suited for custom images with a title.

Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: value

Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: indicator
Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.abstract: The layout best suited for representing a single value range.

Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: gradient
Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.abstract: The layout best suited for representing a single value range, where the data can be further explained using color.

Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: doubleIndicator
Structs/LayoutName.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.abstract: The layout best suited for representing two value ranges.

Structs/PluginProfile.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: readOnly
Structs/PluginProfile.html#/s:10StreamDe.abstract: Boolean to mark the profile as read-only. False by default.

Structs/PluginProfile.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: dontAutoSwitchWhenInstalled
Structs/PluginProfile.html#/s:10StreamDe.abstract: Boolean to prevent Stream Deck from automatically switching to this profile when installed. False by default.

Structs/PluginSoftware.html#/s:10StreamD.name: minimumVersion
Structs/PluginSoftware.html#/s:10StreamD.abstract: The minimum version of the Stream deck application that the plugin requires.

Structs/PluginSoftware.html#/s:10StreamD.name: minimumVersion(_:)
Structs/PluginSoftware.html#/s:10StreamD.abstract: Convenience method for setting the software version in a manifest.

Structs/PluginOS.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Pl.name: minimumVersion
Structs/PluginOS.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Pl.abstract: The minimum version of the operating system that the plugin requires.

Structs/PluginOS.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Pl.name: mac(minimumVersion:)

Structs/PluginOS.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Pl.name: win(minimumVersion:)
Structs/PluginOS.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Pl.abstract: Initialize a windows OS with the specified minimum version

Structs/PluginActionState.html#/s:10Stre.name: name
Structs/PluginActionState.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: The name of the state displayed in the dropdown menu in the Multi action.

Structs/PluginActionState.html#/s:10Stre.name: showTitle
Structs/PluginActionState.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: Boolean to hide/show the title. True by default.

Structs/PluginActionState.html#/s:10Stre.name: fontUnderline
Structs/PluginActionState.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: Boolean to have an underline under the title. False by default

Structs/PluginInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: version
Structs/PluginInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.abstract: The plugin version as written in the manifest.json.

Structs/StreamDeckApp.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: language

Structs/StreamDeckApp.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: platform
Structs/StreamDeckApp.html#/s:10StreamDe.abstract: On which platform the Stream Deck application is running.

Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.name: application
Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.abstract: A json object containing information about the application.

Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.name: plugin
Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.abstract: A json object containing information about the plugin.

Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.name: devicePixelRatio
Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.abstract: Pixel ratio value to indicate if the Stream Deck application is running on a HiDPI screen.

Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.name: colors
Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.abstract: A json object containing information about the preferred user colors.

Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.name: init(string:)
Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html#/s:1.abstract: Create an object from a JSON string.

Structs/DeviceInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: name

Structs/DeviceInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.name: size
Structs/DeviceInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck1.abstract: The number of columns and rows of keys that the device owns.

Structs/TitleInfo/Parameters.html#/s:10S.name: fontUnderline
Structs/TitleInfo/Parameters.html#/s:10S.abstract: Boolean indicating an underline under the title.

Structs/TitleInfo/Parameters.html#/s:10S.name: showTitle
Structs/TitleInfo/Parameters.html#/s:10S.abstract: Boolean indicating if the title is visible.

Structs/TitleInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck9T.name: state
Structs/TitleInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck9T.abstract: This value indicates for which state of the action the title or title parameters have been changed.

Structs/TitleInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck9T.name: titleParameters
Structs/TitleInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck9T.abstract: A json object describing the new title parameters.

Structs/TitleInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck9T.name: settings
Structs/TitleInfo.html#/s:10StreamDeck9T.abstract: This json object contains data that you can set and is stored persistently.

Structs/EnvironmentValues.html#/s:10Stre.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/EnvironmentValues.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: Get the value of a context key.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:10StreamDeck.name: wrappedValue
Structs/Environment.html#/s:10StreamDeck.abstract: Gets and sets the value in the shared ContextValues instance.

Structs/TouchTapEvent.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: settings

Structs/TouchTapEvent.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: hold
Structs/TouchTapEvent.html#/s:10StreamDe.abstract: Boolean which is true when long tap happened

Structs/TouchTapEvent.html#/s:10StreamDe.name: tapPos
Structs/TouchTapEvent.html#/s:10StreamDe.abstract: The array which holds (x, y) coordinates as a position of tap inside of LCD slot associated with action.

Structs/EncoderPressEvent.html#/s:10Stre.name: settings
Structs/EncoderPressEvent.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: This json object contains data that you can set and are stored persistently.

Structs/EncoderPressEvent.html#/s:10Stre.name: pressed
Structs/EncoderPressEvent.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: Boolean which is true on encoder pressed, else false on released

Structs/EncoderEvent.html#/s:10StreamDec.name: settings
Structs/EncoderEvent.html#/s:10StreamDec.abstract: This json object contains data that you can set and are stored persistently.

Structs/EncoderEvent.html#/s:10StreamDec.name: pressed
Structs/EncoderEvent.html#/s:10StreamDec.abstract: Boolean which is true on rotation when encoder pressed.

Structs/EncoderEvent.html#/s:10StreamDec.name: ticks
Structs/EncoderEvent.html#/s:10StreamDec.abstract: The integer which holds the number of “ticks” on encoder rotation.

Structs/KeyEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Ke.name: settings

Structs/KeyEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Ke.abstract: This is a parameter that is only set when the action has multiple states defined in its manifest.json.

Structs/KeyEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Ke.name: userDesiredState
Structs/KeyEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Ke.abstract: This is a parameter that is only set when the action is triggered with a specific value from a Multi Action.

Structs/KeyEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Ke.name: isInMultiAction
Structs/KeyEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck8Ke.abstract: Boolean indicating if the action is inside a Multi Action.

Structs/AppearEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck.abstract: This is a parameter that is only set when the action has multiple states defined in its manifest.json.

Structs/AppearEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck.name: isInMultiAction
Structs/AppearEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck.abstract: Boolean indicating if the action is inside a Multi Action.

Structs/AppearEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck.name: controller
Structs/AppearEvent.html#/s:10StreamDeck.abstract: Holds the name of the controller of the current action.

Structs/GlobalSettingsEvent/Payload.html.abstract: This json object contains data that you can set and are stored persistently.

Structs/DeviceConnectionEvent.html.name: DeviceConnectionEvent

Structs/EncoderEvent.html.name: EncoderEvent

Structs/EncoderPressEvent.html.abstract: Information received about a rotary encoder event.

Structs.html#/s:10StreamDeck10NoSettings.abstract: A struct that indicates an action has no settings.

Structs/Environment.html.abstract: Keys marked as exported are expected to be set by an action before it finishes.

Structs/EnvironmentValues.html.abstract: The central registry of EnvironmentKey and their values.

Structs/TitleInfo.html.name: TitleInfo
Structs/TitleInfo.html.abstract: Information about the title of an action.

Structs/DeviceInfo.html.name: DeviceInfo

Structs/PluginRegistrationInfo.html.abstract: The registration information sent by the Stream Deck application when launching the plugin.

Structs/ApplicationsToMonitor.html.name: ApplicationsToMonitor
Structs/ApplicationsToMonitor.html.abstract: A plugin can request to be notified when some applications are launched or terminated.

Structs/LayoutName.html.abstract: Layouts describe how information is shown on the Stream Deck + touch display.

Structs/RotaryEncoder.html.name: RotaryEncoder

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: Settings
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Settings returned by the Stream Deck application.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: name
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The name of the plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: description
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Provides a general description of what the plugin does.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: category
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The name of the custom category in which the actions should be listed.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: categoryIcon
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The relative path to a PNG image without the .png extension.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: author
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The author of the plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: icon
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The relative path to a PNG image without the .png extension.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: url
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: A URL displayed to the user if he wants to get more info about the plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: version
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The version of the plugin which can only contain digits and periods.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: os
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The list of operating systems supported by the plugin as well as the minimum supported version of the operating system.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: applicationsToMonitor
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: List of application identifiers to monitor (applications launched or terminated).

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: software
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Indicates which version of the Stream Deck application is required to install the plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: sdkVersion
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: This value should be set to 2.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: codePath
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The relative path to the HTML/binary file containing the code of the plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: codePathMac
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Override CodePath for macOS.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: codePathWin
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Override CodePath for Windows.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: actions
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The actions defined by your plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: didReceiveSettings(action:context:device:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Event received after calling the getSettings API to retrieve the persistent data stored for the action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: didReceiveGlobalSettings(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Event received after calling the getGlobalSettings API to retrieve the global persistent data.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: didReceiveGlobalSettings(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Event received after calling the getGlobalSettings API to retrieve the global persistent data.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: willAppear(action:context:device:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When an instance of an action is displayed on the Stream Deck, for example when the hardware is first plugged in, or when a folder containing that action is entered, the plugin will receive a willAppear event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: willDisappear(action:context:device:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When an instance of an action ceases to be displayed on Stream Deck, for example when switching profiles or folders, the plugin will receive a willDisappear event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: keyDown(action:context:device:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When the user presses a key, the plugin will receive the keyDown event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: keyUp(action:context:device:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When the user releases a key, the plugin will receive the keyUp event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: titleParametersDidChange(action:context:device:info:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When the user changes the title or title parameters of the instance of an action, the plugin will receive a titleParametersDidChange event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: deviceDidConnect(_:deviceInfo:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When a device is plugged to the computer, the plugin will receive a deviceDidConnect event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: deviceDidDisconnect(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When a device is unplugged from the computer, the plugin will receive a deviceDidDisconnect event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: applicationDidLaunch(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: A plugin can request in its manifest.json to be notified when some applications are launched or terminated.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: applicationDidTerminate(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: A plugin can request in its manifest.json to be notified when some applications are launched or terminated.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: systemDidWakeUp()
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: When the computer is wake up, the plugin will receive the systemDidWakeUp event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: propertyInspectorDidAppear(action:context:device:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The plugin will receive a propertyInspectorDidAppear event when the Property Inspector appears.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: propertyInspectorDidDisappear(action:context:device:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The plugin will receive a propertyInspectorDidDisappear event when the Property Inspector appears.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: sentToPlugin(context:action:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The plugin will receive a sendToPlugin event when the Property Inspector sends a sendToPlugin event.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: pluginWasCreated()
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Called immediately after main().

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setSettings(in:to:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Save data persistently for the action’s instance.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setSettings(in:to:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Save data persistently for the action’s instance.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: getSettings(in:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Request the persistent data for the action’s instance.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setGlobalSettings(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Save data securely and globally for the plugin.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: getGlobalSettings()
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Request the global persistent data.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: openURL(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Open an URL in the default browser.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: logMessage(_:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Write a debug log to the logs file.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: logMessage(_:separator:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Write a debug log to the logs file.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setTitle(in:to:target:state:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Dynamically change the title of an instance of an action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setImage(in:to:target:state:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Dynamically change the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setImage(in:toImage:withExtension:subdirectory:target:state:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Dynamically change the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setImage(in:toSVG:target:state:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Dynamically change the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: showAlert(in:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Temporarily show an alert icon on the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: showOk(in:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Temporarily show an OK checkmark icon on the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: setState(in:to:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Change the state of the action’s instance supporting multiple states.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: switchToProfile(named:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Switch to one of the preconfigured read-only profiles.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: sendToPropertyInspector(in:action:payload:)
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Send a payload to the Property Inspector.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: main()
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The default main function.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.name: executableName
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Determine the CodePath for the plugin based on the bundles executable’s name.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: Settings
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Settings returned by the Stream Deck application.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: name
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The name of the action. This string is visible to the user in the actions list.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: uuid
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The unique identifier of the action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: icon
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The relative path to a PNG image without the .png extension.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: states
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Specifies an array of states.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: controllers
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Specifies an array of controllers.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: encoder
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: An object containing encoder information.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: propertyInspectorPath
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: This can override PropertyInspectorPath member from the plugin if you wish to have different PropertyInspectorPath based on the action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: supportedInMultiActions
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Boolean to prevent the action from being used in a Multi Action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: tooltip
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The string displayed as tooltip when the user leaves the mouse over your action in the actions list.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: visibleInActionsList
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Boolean to hide the action in the actions list.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: userTitleEnabled
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Boolean to disable the title field for users in the property inspector. True by default.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: context
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The context value for the instance.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: coordinates
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The coordinates of the instance.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: init(context:coordinates:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Create a new instance with the specified context and coordinates.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: didReceiveSettings(device:payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Event received after calling the getSettings API to retrieve the persistent data stored for the action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: willAppear(device:payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: When an instance of an action is displayed on the Stream Deck, for example when the hardware is first plugged in, or when a folder containing that action is entered, the plugin will receive a willAppear event.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: willDisappear(device:payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: When an instance of an action ceases to be displayed on Stream Deck, for example when switching profiles or folders, the plugin will receive a willDisappear event.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: keyDown(device:payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: When the user presses a key, the plugin will receive the keyDown event.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: keyUp(device:payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: When the user releases a key, the plugin will receive the keyUp event.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: titleParametersDidChange(device:info:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: When the user changes the title or title parameters of the instance of an action, the plugin will receive a titleParametersDidChange event.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: propertyInspectorDidAppear(device:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The plugin will receive a propertyInspectorDidAppear event when the Property Inspector appears.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: propertyInspectorDidDisappear(device:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The plugin will receive a propertyInspectorDidDisappear event when the Property Inspector appears.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: sentToPlugin(payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The plugin will receive a sendToPlugin event when the Property Inspector sends a sendToPlugin event.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setSettings(to:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Save data persistently for the action’s instance.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setSettings(to:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Save data persistently for the action’s instance.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: getSettings()
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Request the persistent data for the action’s instance.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: logMessage(_:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Write a debug log to the logs file.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: logMessage(_:separator:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Write a debug log to the logs file.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setTitle(to:target:state:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Dynamically change the title of an instance of an action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setImage(to:target:state:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Dynamically change the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setImage(toImage:withExtension:subdirectory:target:state:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Dynamically change the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setImage(toSVG:target:state:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Dynamically change the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: showAlert()
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Temporarily show an alert icon on the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: showOk()
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Temporarily show an OK checkmark icon on the image displayed by an instance of an action.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setState(to:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Change the state of the action’s instance supporting multiple states.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: sendToPropertyInspector(payload:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: Send a payload to the Property Inspector.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setFeedback(_:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The plugin can send a setFeedback event to the Stream Deck application to dynamically change properties of items on the Stream Deck + touch display layout.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: setFeedbackLayout(_:)
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The plugin can send a setFeedbackLayout event to the Stream Deck application to dynamically change the current Stream Deck + touch display layout.

Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.name: uuid
Protocols/Action.html#/s:10StreamDeck6Ac.abstract: The Action’s UUID.

Protocols/Locatable.html.name: Locatable
Protocols/Locatable.html.abstract: An event that includes coordinate information about the action.

Protocols/EventSettings.html.name: EventSettings
Protocols/EventSettings.html.abstract: An event which includes the action’s settings.

Protocols/Action.html.name: Action
Protocols/Action.html.abstract: A single action that can be assigned to a Stream Deck key.

Protocols/KeyAction.html.name: KeyAction
Protocols/KeyAction.html.abstract: A convenience protocol that provides default values for an Action.

Protocols/StatelessKeyAction.html.name: StatelessKeyAction
Protocols/StatelessKeyAction.html.abstract: A convenience protocol that provides default values for an Action.

Protocols/EncoderAction.html.name: EncoderAction
Protocols/EncoderAction.html.abstract: A convenience protocol that provides default values for an Action.

Protocols/PluginDelegate.html.name: PluginDelegate
Protocols/PluginDelegate.html.abstract: The PluginDelegate represents the entry point to to your plugin and is used to generate the manifest.

Protocols/EnvironmentKey.html.name: EnvironmentKey
Protocols/EnvironmentKey.html.abstract: A key with an associated value type.

Extensions/PluginManifest.html#/s:10Stre.name: executableName
Extensions/PluginManifest.html#/s:10Stre.abstract: Determine the CodePath for the plugin based on the bundles executable’s name.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: init(argument:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Create a URL from a command line argument.

Enums/Language.html.name: Language
Enums/Language.html.abstract: In which language the Stream Deck application is running.

Enums/Platform.html.name: Platform
Enums/Platform.html.abstract: On which platform the Stream Deck application is running.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: port
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The port that should be used to create the WebSocket

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: uuid
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: A unique identifier string that should be used to register the plugin once the WebSocket is opened.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: event
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The event type that should be used to register the plugin once the WebSocket is opened

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: info
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: The Stream Deck application information and devices information.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: action(forID:)
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Look up the action type based on the UUID.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: registerInstance(actionID:context:coordinates:)
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Register a new instance of an action from a willAppear event.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: removeInstance(_:)
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Remove an instance of an action from a willDisappear event.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: sendEvent(_:action:context:payload:)
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Send raw events over the the socket.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.name: sendEvent(_:action:context:payload:)
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html#/s:10Strea.abstract: Send raw events over the the socket.

Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html.name: StreamDeckPlugin
Classes/StreamDeckPlugin.html.abstract: An object that manages a pluginss main event loop.
